post.description:
**This endpoint allows you to invite a Teammate to your account via email.**

You can set a Teammate's initial permissions using the `scopes` array in the request body. Teammate's will receive a minimum set of scopes from Twilio SendGrid that are necessary for the Teammate to function.

**Note:** A teammate invite will expire after 7 days, but you may resend the invitation at any time to reset the expiration date.

scopes.description: Set to specify list of scopes that teammate should have. Should be empty if teammate is an admin.

is_admin.description: Set to true if teammate should be an admin user

scopes.description: Initial set of permissions to give to teammate if they accept the invite

is_admin.description: Set to true if teammate should have admin privileges

get.description:
**This endpoint allows you to retrieve a list of all current Teammates.**

You can limit the number of results returned using the `limit` query paramater. To return results from a specific Teammate, use the `offset` paramter. The Response Headers will include pagination info.

user_type.description: Indicate the type of user: owner user, teammate admin user, or normal teammate

is_admin.description: Set to true if teammate has admin privileges

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The token for the invite that you want to resend.

post.description:
**This endpoint allows you to resend a Teammate invitation.**

Teammate invitations will expire after 7 days. Resending an invitation will reset the expiration date.

scopes.description: Initial set of permissions to give to teammate if they accept the invite

is_admin.description: Set to true if teammate should have admin privileges

get.description:
**This endpoint allows you to retrieve a list of all recent access requests.**

The Response Header's `link` parameter will include pagination info.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Optional field to limit the number of results returned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Optional beginning point in the list to retrieve from.

scope_group_name.description: Name of group of scopes associated to page teammate is requesting access to

get.description:
**This endpoint allows you to retrieve a list of all pending Teammate invitations.**

Each teammate invitation is valid for 7 days. Users may resend the invitation to refresh the expiration date.

email.description: Email address teammate invite will be sent to

scopes.description: List of permissions to give teammate if they accept

is_admin.description: Set to true to indicate teammate should have the same set of permissions as parent user

token.description: Invitation token used to identify user

expiration_date.description: timestamp indicates when invite will expire. Expiration is 7 days after invite creation

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the teammate that you want to retrieve.

get.description:
**This endpoint allows you to retrieve a specific Teammate by username.**

You can retrieve the username's for each of your Teammates using the "Retrieve all Teammates" endpoint.

user_type.description: Indicate the type of user: account owner, teammate admin user, or normal teammate

is_admin.description: Set to true if teammate has admin privileges

patch.description:
**This endpoint allows you to update a teammate’s permissions.**

To turn a teammate into an admin, the request body should contain an `is_admin` set to `true`. Otherwise, set `is_admin` to `false` and pass in all the scopes that a teammate should have.

**Only the parent user or other admin teammates can update another teammate’s permissions.**

**Admin users can only update permissions.**

scopes.description: Provide list of scopes that should be given to teammate. If specifying list of scopes, is_admin should be set to False.

is_admin.description: Set to True if this teammate should be promoted to an admin user. If True, scopes should be an empty array.

user_type.description: Indicate the type of user: owner user, teammate admin user, or normal teammate

is_admin.description: Set to true if teammate has admin priveleges

errors.message: one or more of given scopes are invalid

delete.description:
**This endpoint allows you to delete a teammate.**

**Only the parent user or an admin teammate can delete another teammate.**

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: The ID of the request that you want to approve.

patch.description:
**This endpoint allows you to approve an access attempt.**

**Note:** Only teammate admins may approve another teammate’s access request.

scope_group_name.description: name of feature teammate will be given access to

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: The ID of the request that you want to deny.

delete.description:
**This endpoint allows you to deny an attempt to access your account.**

**Note:** Only teammate admins may delete a teammate's access request.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The token for the invite you want to delete.

delete.description: **This endpoint allows you to delete a pending teammate invite.**
